

/**************

DOCUMENTATION OF THE HASHSET LIST < > 1.15

**************/



import java.util.HashSet;
import java.util.Iterator;

public class MyClass {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub

        HashSet < String > name = new HashSet< String >();

        name.add("Patrick");

        name.add("Hopeson");

        name.add("Mayamiko");

        name.add("Victor");

        name.add("Moses");

        name.add("Dalitso");

	
	// Using the Enhanced For... Loop 

        for (String namesOfStudents : name)
            System.out.println(namesOfStudents);

        System.out.println("----------------");

	
	// Using the Iterator Class

        Iterator < String >  iterate = name.iterator();

        while (iterate.hasNext())
            System.out.println(iterate.next());

       
    }

}




Victor
Patrick
Hopeson
Mayamiko
Dalitso
Moses
----------------
Victor
Patrick
Hopeson
Mayamiko
Dalitso
Moses
